dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S476 RH: To amend the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal Development Act to extend to the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park Commission.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources
Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: To amend the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal Development Act to extend to the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park Commission.

section.header: Chesapeake and ohio canal national historical park commission
section.text: The Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park Commission (referred to in this Act as the Commission) is authorized in accordance with the provisions of section 6 of the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal Development Act (16 U.S.C. 410y–4), except that the Commission shall terminate 10 years after the date of enactment of this Act.

endorsement.action-desc: Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed
